ConfigItem.Name: Contact::EventModulePost###800-SetOrganisation
ConfigItem.Description: Event module to add organisations based on the enabled organisation mapping methods.

ConfigItem.Name: Contact::Organisation::Methode###MailDomain
ConfigItem.Description: Enables organization mapping method "MailDomain" to assign the organization based on the contact email domain. The domain patterns are maintained at the organizations.

ConfigItem.Name: Contact::Organisation::Methode###Default
ConfigItem.Description: Enables organization mapping method "Default" and sets the defined organization from the "Contact::Organization::Default" configuration.

ConfigItem.Name: Contact::Organisation::Methode###Personal
ConfigItem.Description: Enables organization mapping method "Personal" and sets the contact email as an organization.

ConfigItem.Name: Contact::Organisation::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a standard organization to be used in the "Default" method of organization mapping. The ID or the number or the name of the organization can be specified.
